name: plance_spawn_03
text: We are but a simple servant.
text_simple: we are but a simple servant

name: plance_spawn_05
pretty_criteria: Spawning|Spawning in the loadout|A grandmaster hero chat wheel was used

name: plance_battlebegins_01
text: We are coiled, ready to strike.
text_simple: we are coiled ready to strike
pretty_criteria: As the game starts|Spawning in the loadout

name: plance_firstblood_01
text: First blood! Let our great combat begin!
text_simple: first blood let our great combat begin

name: plance_cast_02

name: plance_ability_failure_03
text: This was all of our fault!
text_simple: this was all of our fault

name: plance_levelup_06
text: We will set things to right.
text_simple: we will set things to right

name: plance_levelup_09
text: We are more able, and more willing!
text_simple: we are more able and more willing

name: plance_kill_01
text: All is at it should be.
text_simple: all is at it should be

name: plance_kill_07
text: This fight is over for you.
text_simple: this fight is over for you

name: plance_kill_09
text: We have strength in numbers. What did you have?
text_simple: we have strength in numbers what did you have

name: plance_kill_10
text: We outnumbered you. We outnumbered them all!
text_simple: we outnumbered you we outnumbered them all
pretty_criteria: Killing a hero|A master hero chat wheel was used

name: plance_rival_01
text: From one stampede to another: give it up.
text_simple: from one stampede to another give it up

name: plance_rival_02
text: What would a tunnel rat want with such power?
text_simple: what would a tunnel rat want with such power

name: plance_rival_03
text: You should have applied more of yourselves.
text_simple: you should have applied more of yourselves

name: plance_rival_04
text: Back over the wall with you.
text_simple: back over the wall with you

name: plance_rival_05
text: How many ways should we split your bounty, hunter?
text_simple: how many ways should we split your bounty hunter

name: plance_rival_06
text: Too many targets for you, Sniper?
text_simple: too many targets for you sniper

name: plance_rival_08
text: We have enough spearmen already, Slardar.
text_simple: we have enough spearmen already slardar

name: plance_rival_10
text: We've had enough of your kind, Magi.
text_simple: weve had enough of your kind magi

name: plance_ally_01
text: Chaos Knight: let's show them the meaning of stampede.
text_simple: chaos knight lets show them the meaning of stampede
pretty_criteria: Chaos Knight is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: plance_ally_02
text: That is a nice... digger you have there Meepo.
text_simple: that is a nice digger you have there meepo
pretty_criteria: Meepo is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: plance_ally_03
text: Drink to our coming victory, Brewmaster.
text_simple: drink to our coming victory brewmaster
pretty_criteria: Brewmaster is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: plance_ally_04
text: We shall drown them in numbers, Siren.
text_simple: we shall drown them in numbers siren
pretty_criteria: Naga Siren is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: plance_ally_05
text: You keep the light. We will protect it.
text_simple: you keep the light we will protect it
pretty_criteria: Keeper of the Light is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: plance_ally_06
text: They will shiver before us, Maiden.
text_simple: they will shiver before us maiden

name: plance_ally_07
text: We could always use a few more, Morphling.
text_simple: we could always use a few more morphling

name: plance_fastres_01
text: It will take more than that!
text_simple: it will take more than that

name: plance_respawn_04
text: They cannot kill all of us.
text_simple: they cannot kill all of us

text: We have more where that came from.

text: We will raise a new army.
text_simple: we will raise a new army

name: plance_respawn_11
text: We will sweep across the field once more.
text_simple: we will sweep across the field once more

name: plance_rare_01
text: We want nothing of this war. Only a return to peace and quiet.
text_simple: we want nothing of this war only a return to peace and quiet

name: plance_rare_02
text: We ask only for peace for our people. Is that so much?
text_simple: we ask only for peace for our people is that so much

name: plance_rare_03
text: If we are to be used and spent, let it be toward a noble purpose.
text_simple: if we are to be used and spent let it be toward a noble purpose

name: plance_purch_01
text: More than we would earn in our lifetimes.
text_simple: more than we would earn in our lifetimes

name: plance_purch_02

name: plance_blink_02

name: plance_scepter_02
